tags: None
review: I'm judging the doctor not by his qualifications or how much he knows, but by how he treats the patient and how comfortable he makes them. He did not even examine my leg properly neither did he give me any information. I had to ask all he questions. On showing the MRI he read out what was already written in the report which I had already read. As a doctor he should have explained what it means. I was so disappointed that I went to another doctor and had such a detailed examination of my leg. He even taught me a few exercises and this doctor was actually worried about my leg and was not just trying to wash his hands off. I wish I had gone there first.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor patiently heard my problem &  was able  to get to the crux of it *** **** *********** ******* **** The pain has reduced by a considerable amount within 2 days. I will highly recommend Dr.Chandrashekar to others. Many thanks sir!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very good Doctor, he explained the problem exactly and also told how the muscle spasm pain will come down. He is very friendly and best part is he is right next door to my home. Highly recommend this Doctor for all Ortho issues.

tags: None
review: As a patient we doesn't know about the disease and we ask questions, this doctor is so impatient and doesn't answer any query..  The only thing he will tell you is surgery and nothing else...  Doesn't examine the patient properly and straight away he will ask you to undergo surgery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: The treatment was given very good..  It was a trust worthy and value for the money given. Most importantly the doctor is friendly *** ******* ****.. Overall experience was excellent in hospital and with Dr. Chendrashekar HS.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: The Doctor is very experienced and very educative on the subject. The ambience of the clinic is very beautiful and reachable to all.

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Gave ample time to understand my pain.
Had x ray facility in house. 
Gave simple tips and medicine .. rather than giving a complex procedure. 
Was flexible to guide me to other physiotherapy center.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly. His explanation of the condition is very satisfactory.  Outer office manages the first come first served method.  Overall the ambience of the clinic is good.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: *** ************* ** * **** **** ******* Well experienced doctor. My mother was suffering from knee pain after treatment she is feeling better now. Thank you Dr. CHANDRASHEKAR.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Chandrashekar is down to earth person, he is highly qualified doctor, he explained in detail about my health issue and also advised me as his one of family member
